de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.transform

Class FastMultidimensionalScalingTransform<I,O extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.transform.FastMultidimensionalScalingTransform<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectFilter

    @Alias(value="fastmds")
public class FastMultidimensionalScalingTransform<I,O extends NumberVector>
extends Object
implements ObjectFilter
    Rescale the data set using multidimensional scaling, MDS. This implementation uses power iterations, which is faster when the number of data points is much larger than the desired number of dimensions. This implementation is O(n^2), and uses O(n^2) memory.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
